snippet: The somber ceremony dedicating the National September 11 Memorial Museum was held in the museum’s Foundation Hall, 70 feet beneath ground level at bedrock.
abstract: Pres Obama and other dignitaries join rescue workers and families of Sept 11 victims to dedicate the new National September 11 Memorial Museum; about700 guests attend somber ceremony held in museum's Foundation Hall.

byline.original: By STEPHEN FARRELL and PETER BAKER

lead_paragraph: The somber ceremony dedicating the National September 11 Memorial Museum was held in the museum’s Foundation Hall, 70 feet beneath ground level at bedrock.

headline.main: At 9/11 Museum Dedication, Remembrance and Resilience
